Factions IRO
1 UBR: Dusktear Choir Spellslinger deck focused on discarding and playing instants and sorceries. GWU: Kanmaro Order Control deck focused on getting artifacts and enchantments into the graveyard to set up big finishers. WBG: Festerweb Troupe Midrange aristocrats deck focused on sacrificing and recurring artifacts and enchantments. RWB: Jikizu Creed Aggressive aristocrats deck focused on sacrificing tokens with ritual. GUR: Kumei Movement Midrange deck focused on getting value for discarding cards. 1
